title: Citibank Thailand Opens Third Branch at CentralWorld Shopping Complex
summary: Bangkok - Citibank, N.A. Thailand officially opened its third branch at the CentralWorld Shopping Complex, offering customers a diverse choice of promotions specially created from the bank's three core businesses: Retail Banking, Credit Cards and Consumer Lending.
tag-1: Citibank Thailand Opens Third Branch at CentralWorld Shopping Complex
tag-2: Bangkok – Citibank, N.A. Thailand officially opened its third branch at the CentralWorld Shopping Complex, offering customers a diverse choice of promotions specially created from the bank's three core businesses: Retail Banking, Credit Cards and Consumer Lending.
tag-3: Mr. N. Rajashekaran, Country Business Manager, Citibank, N.A., said that Citibank is the world's leading bank with a history of innovation and customer services. The bank offers a broad range of excellent financial products and services committed to delivering total customer satisfaction everyday. Opening the third branch at the CentralWorld Shopping Complex not only marks an important milestone for Citibank Thailand but it also shows how Citibank is committed to its customers and to the entire financial service sector in Thailand.
tag-4: The Citibank CentralWorld Branch is the third full-service banking outlet in Thailand, located on the fourth floor, Beacon Zone of the CentralWorld Shopping Complex. The premises is divided into two sections offering a fully-functional retail banking service and a Citigold Lounge catering exclusively to Citigold wealth management banking clients.
tag-5: Mr. N. Rajashekaran said, "The CentralWorld Branch is fully equipped with state-of-the-art banking technology under Citibank's pioneering Smart Banking concept offering customers a full range of financial products and services. There is also a video conference facility installed in the branch, enabling clients access to investment consultation remotely (by prior appointment).
tag-6: "The Citibank Advisory Team is available to advise and assist every customer and enable them to enjoy a personalized service that fulfills their individual needs. The branch is open seven days a week from 11 a.m. to 7:30 p.m. Citibank is confident that the new branch will be well-received by the public and our current customers as it is located in the heart of Bangkok. The CentralWorld Shopping Complex attracts high-spending shoppers, both local and overseas."
tag-7: Last September, Citibank opened its second branch at the United Center on Silom Road. The opening of the third branch at the Central World Branch marks an important milestone for Citibank Thailand in the Year of the Dragon 2012. To celebrate this auspicious year, the bank has prepared a diverse range of promotions to welcome customers to the Central World Branch:
tag-11: For more information, contact the Citibank CentralWorld Branch at 02 677 4999, call CitiPhone Banking 1588 (24 hours per day), or visit www.citibank.co.th.
tag-12: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
